pkgmetadata.longdescription: =================================================scimath: Scientific and Mathematical calculations=================================================http://scimath.readthedocs.org/en/latest/The SciMath project includes packages to support scientific and mathematicalcalculations, beyond the capabilities offered by SciPy.- scimath.interpolate- scimath.mathematics- scimath.units- scimath.physical_quantitiesPrerequisites-------------* `Traits <https://pypi.python.org/pypi/traits>`_* `NumPy <https://pypi.python.org/pypi/numpy>`_* `SciPy <https://pypi.python.org/pypi/scipy>`_
